item.title: Episode 1: Dual Payment Methods Demo
item.description: Demonstrating how keysend and Lightning address fallbacks work for universal wallet compatibility
item.content:encoded:
This episode shows how podcasters can provide both keysend pubkeys and Lightning addresses for the same recipient.

Keysend-capable wallets (Alby Hub, LND) will use the faster keysend method.

Wallets without keysend support (Primal, Coinos) will automatically fall back to Lightning addresses.

No TSB proxy needed - universal compatibility through smart routing!

item.title: Episode 2: Guest Episode with Special Splits
item.description: Special episode featuring a guest with modified payment splits
item.content:encoded:
This episode features a special guest, so we've adjusted our value splits to include them.

This demonstrates how episode-level value blocks can override channel defaults.

The guest only has a Lightning address, showing mixed payment method compatibility.

item.title: Episode 3: Eliminating TSB Proxy with Dual Payment Methods
item.description: The clean solution to universal wallet compatibility in value4value podcasting
item.content:encoded:
The Problem

  • Primal and Coinos wallets can't pay keysend addresses (which podcasters prefer)
  • Current solution uses TSB proxy (complex, adds dependency)
  • Need a cleaner way for these wallets to participate in value4value podcasting

The Solution: Dual Payment Recipients

Podcasters provide both keysend pubkeys AND Lightning addresses for the same recipient in their RSS feeds:

<!-- Same person, two payment options -->
<podcast:valueRecipient name="Alice Host" type="node" address="02eec..." split="45" />
<podcast:valueRecipient name="Alice Host" type="lnaddress" address="alice@getalby.com" split="45" />

Smart Payment Routing

Apps automatically detect wallet capabilities and choose the best payment method:

  • Alby Hub/LND wallets → Use keysend (faster, preferred)
  • Primal/Coinos wallets → Use Lightning address fallback
  • No compatible method → Skip with clear error

Benefits

✅ No TSB proxy needed - eliminates complexity

✅ Universal wallet support - works with any NWC wallet

✅ Podcaster control - they decide who gets fallback options

✅ Standards compliant - uses existing RSS specification

✅ Performance optimized - keysend when possible, fallback when needed

Implementation

  1. Update RSS feeds with dual recipients
  2. Replace payment logic with smart routing
  3. Remove TSB proxy code entirely

Result: Clean, universal value4value payments that work with every wallet while preserving keysend benefits where available.
